First thing, just because one stupid virus scanner detects a virus signature, than in no way means there is a virus. Second, just because one does not detect a virus, that in no way means there is not a virus. Third, you should read those first two several hundred times if you do not get it.

Virus scanners look for tiny fragments of code that hash out to a value that is recorded for ease of detection. They are not foolproof. And often, the people who rely upon them prove that by being absolute fools.

I have no idea if this torrent is safe or not. I will not touch it. But please bother to learn a bit and protect yourself by *NOT* being an idiot. Ther is no "Dummies Guide to not being a Fucking Moron with your PC" book yet. So pull your heads from your asses and learn.

use fairlight installer on disc 1 then extract dlc to your prototype 2 folder then double click it =)

just to clarify for people wondering.

1. i have the fairlight version of the game and this dlc unlocker worked.

2. it did not mess up my save game (incase u was worried it would)

3. drag the exe to the prototype2 folder (the one with the game.exe)

4. double click the unlocker, a box with chinese symbols will pop up, press ok and it will load a website in your browser. --- this is exactly what the program was intended to do and i can say with certainty this file is legit.

feel free to google how these programs work if you want more proof.
